ac.special: 14 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

trait.name: Shared Resistances
entries: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon uses its Breath Weapon, and it makes a number of Bite and Claw attacks equal to half the spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Bite and Claw
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The dragon exhales a stream of multicolored energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 2d6} damage of your choice of a damage type this dragon has resistance to on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
